channel.title: (alJabr: An example interpreter project using Maven and ANTLR)
channel.description: Walkthrough of implementing an interpreter over different algebras using ANTLR and Maven

image.title: (alJabr: An example interpreter project using Maven and ANTLR)

div.p: In this post, we build an interpreter over boolean expressions using ANTLR and Maven. The code for the project is hosted on GitHub, released under the GPL version 3.0 license. While the project contains a manifest.scm file to create a development environment via Guix, this post assumes you know how to install various necessary software dependencies and tools for your choice operating system.
